name: The Order of Artemis - Prologue
description:
Immerse yourself in a captivating crime-solving adventure like no other! My detective visual novel is set in 19th-century Scandinavia, a land steeped in mysticism and intrigue. Meet three unlikely companions who, bound by fate and circumstance, must join forces to brave the perilous Northern European countryside. Together, they must combat paranormal phenomena and face off against fearsome mystical creatures, piecing together clues and gathering intel to unravel the secrets of the ancient Society of Saint Artemis. With danger lurking at every turn, will they survive the journey to uncover the truth?

The game is completely free, but if you want to support me, you can just subscribe to my Twitter:

DM_Dreamer
